title: FBS_OUTCONTROL (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_OUTCONTROL :
Definition of SF_OutControl function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment: Block activation startup inhibit is active. Reset required.

rows.Name: LOCK
rows.Comment: Safety function startup inhibit is active. Reset required.

rows.Name: OUTPUT_ENABLE
rows.Comment: Process control is active and safety is enabled.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal in state INIT.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal in state LOCK

rows.Name: ERR_CONTROL
rows.Comment: Static signal at ProcessControl in state OUTPUT_DISABLE.

rows.Name: ERR_INIT
rows.Comment:
Simultaneous rising trigger at Reset and ProcessControl in
state INIT.

rows.Name: ERR_LOCK
rows.Comment:
Simultaneous rising trigger at Reset and ProcessControl in
state LOCK
